verbose_text: The phosphatidylinositoi 3-kinase (PI3K)/Akt signaling pathway regulates and controls a variety of cellular functions, such as proliferation, growth and survival Under normal circumstances, the activated PI3K products, phosphatidylinositol -bisphosphate [PI P2] and phosphatidylinositol 3,4,5-trisphosphate [PI P3], activated the downstream signaling protein, Akt, as a second messenger.
